We have an excellent New Year special on <a href="https://www.lunanode.com"><b>LunaNode</b></a>, the Toronto cloud platform!

<b>m.1s</b>
– 1 GB RAM
– 15 GB SSD disk
– 1 vCPU
– 1 TB bandwidth @ 1gbps
– KVM
– Tons of Cloud Features (see below!)
– Just $3.50/mo, or $0.00486/hour!

To get started, <a href="https://www.lunanode.com"><b>sign up for an account</b></a>, add credit, and press Create VM. We have limited stock, so grab your m.1s instance before it runs out!

You can deploy this plan in our main Toronto location, as well as our Montreal and France locations.

If the affordable pricing isn't enough to convince you, then <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/"><b>check out our awesome features</b></a>!

* Our services are billed hourly! If you just need a VM for a couple hours, you can pay as little as 1 cent.
* <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/snapshots"><b>Snapshots</b></a> capture the current disk state of a virtual machine, and can be taken live while your VM is online with no downtime. You can use snapshots as backups, or to clone a VM.
* <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/volumes"><b>Block Storage Volumes</b></a> let you quickly add additional storage space to your VM. Pricing is $0.03/GB/mo, billed hourly.
* You can select <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/scripts"><b>Startup Scripts</b></a> and SSH keys when deploying a VM. Startup scripts execute the first time a new virtual machine boots, and can be used to automatically configure software on the VM.
* <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/firewalls"><b>Cloud Firewalls</b></a> allow you to restrict network access to groups of virtual machines at the infrastructure level.

We also give customers several services completely FREE!

* <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/monitoring"><b>Uptime Monitoring</b></a> alerts you when your website or other services go down. SMS and phone call alerts are supported, but Twilio charges apply.
* <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/dns"><b>Our High-Performance DNS Hosting</b></a> is feature-packed, supporting load balancing, automatic failover, and geo-targeting.
* Easily receive e-mail on your domains with our <a href="https://www.lunanode.com/features/email"><b>E-mail Hosting</b></a> service!

<a href="https://www.lunanode.com/"><b>Get started on LunaNode now!</b></a>
